name: A Night In The Dark (GooseStranger)
description:
THEME: Illusion

LIMITATION: THERE IS ONLY ONE CHARACTER

Kid just woke up alone in their room from a bad nightmare and their eyes are playing tricks on them. Things around their room look like monsters! Dodge the monsters and collect Kid's favorite toy Teddy Bear to calm Kid down so he can go back to sleep.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move

Sound effects from https://freesound.org/

Music made in https://www.beepbox.co/
